speech: Duda, I think we need to go back... I don't see our umbrella anymore and mom said not to wander too far...
You worry too much, Jorge! We haven't even seen a sea monster yet! That treasure map we found said there might be something here in these rocks!
Sea monsters don't even exist! Besides, even if they WERE real, I don't think I want anything to do with them. I hate swimming.
Shush, I think I see something!
I knew it! There's something shiny in that rock, it looks like a big fish! Let's go take a closer look, Jorge!
I knew it! There's something shiny in that rock, it looks like a big fish! Let's go take a closer look, Jorge!
That's definitely a mermaid in that rock! I’ve always dreamed of meeting a mermaid... Hold my binoculars Julio, I’ll jump!
Jump?! Duda, WAIT-
Hey, girl, be careful, you shouldn't be swimming here!
Oh no! Why am I not moving? The current is too strong!
Duda, I’ll go save you! Don't worry!
WAITTTT!!! Listen to me! I’m Mira, and I'm a life-guard mermaid. Duda, can you hear me? You need to trust me.
Stop swimming and try to float! You're not strong enough to fight the current. We will save you, just don't panic
Ok, now what?
Now you, young man! Don't go into the water to help her if you don't have the proper training. You can help her from the shore
Search for anything that floats and try to toss it to your friend!
Great! Now it's easier for me to help! Duda, just don't grab at me so we’ll both sink, alright?
We must go with the flow and try to leave from the sides, not swim in a straight line. Otherwise the strong current will just tire us and then we'll totally sink.
Oh my gosh, so you ARE a real mermaid? That's SO COOL!
Duda, don't go jumping into the sea like that! Didn't you see the red flag? Mom told me that means the waves are dangerous.
He's right. You can ask me all you want later, but first let me explain why you could have drowned if I didn't help.
Sorry Mira, sorry Julio... I guess because I know how to swim, I just didn't think it would be that dangerous... I got too excited.
Well, I think you learned your lesson. But if you want...
we can play a little more in the shallow, and then you can go back to your family too. Don't leave them worried!
